extension.name: Content - Vimeo Video Embedding
extension.author: OSTraining
extension.description: With this plugin, you can embed Vimeo videos into articles simply by copying and pasting a video URL from Vimeo into an article with fluid responsive support.

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Set the width of the Vimeo video. The default width is 425 pixels.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Set the height of the Vimeo video. The default width is 344 pixels.
